Plot: In March 2012, Iranian movie "A Separation" by Asghar Farhadi, won the Oscar Award for the Best Foreign Language Film. For the Iranian people this was more than a cinematic award. When ...
Title: From Iran, a Separation
Actors: Saeed Aghighi, Rakhshan Bani-Etemad, Asghar Farhadi, Bahman Farmanara
